review: Easy set-up, great instructions. Works quickly and is easy to operate. I wish I would have purchased this much sooner!
author: m

review: Love it! Makes my life so mush easier watching stuff on my TV instead of the tiny computer screen.
author: Stephanie

review: Great product, really enjoying it, received it as a gift!
author: Dawn

review: Easy to understand. Well worth the money.
author: Joanna Prescott

review: Easy to set up. I love it!
author: chargers

review: I'm pleased but my internet connection is too weak most of the time and that makes me crazy.  Trying hard to correct that problem.
author: Rebecca Kelly

review: Purchased this for my mother. For me the easier to set something up the better. This really is plug and play and is very easy to use. My mom has cable internet so no issues with buffering. She uses it to watch netflix and prime and does not use the other features. I also purchased a USB power adapter that is sold on Amazon so that I would not have to run another power cord from her TV. Good product. To be honest I think this ought to come with the USB power cord just so it is more tidy to set up.
author: David L. Johnson

review: This has movies and shows for the whole family.
author: D. White
